name: Pandemic Labs
tagline: The Social Media Agency of Record
description:
Pandemic Labs is a Boston-based social media marketing agency dedicated to helping brands navigate the ever-changing world of new media to create marketing success. Though technology is central to many of our service offerings, we do not define ourselves by any specific set of technologies. The theme at the core of all of our services is the belief that, in our increasingly on-demand world, marketing is a dialogue not a monologue.
Our world demands a philosophy of engagement, and Pandemic Labs excels at creating, executing, and tracking campaigns where brands and consumers actively engage in two-way communication.
